health_potion.name: Health Potion
health_potion.description: A glass vial filled with crimson liquid that glows faintly. Drinking it restores vitality and closes wounds.
health_potion.lore: Crafted by alchemists using rare herbs from the Dark Forest, these potions have saved countless adventurers.

mana_potion.name: Mana Potion
mana_potion.description: A blue crystalline liquid that shimmers with magical energy.
mana_potion.lore: Infused with arcane essence, these potions restore magical energy to spellcasters.

rusty_sword.name: Rusty Sword
rusty_sword.description: An old, worn blade covered in rust. Better than bare fists, but barely.
rusty_sword.lore: Every adventurer starts somewhere. This sword has seen better days.

iron_sword.name: Iron Sword
iron_sword.description: A well-crafted blade of solid iron. Sharp and balanced.
iron_sword.lore: Standard issue for town guards, this reliable weapon has proven itself in countless battles.

stolen_amulet.name: Marta's Amulet
stolen_amulet.description: A silver amulet with a deep blue gemstone. It bears intricate engravings of a dragon.
stolen_amulet.lore: This amulet belonged to Marta's adventuring party. It was a gift from a grateful nobleman they once saved. The bandits stole it during a raid.

mysterious_herb.name: Moonleaf Herb
mysterious_herb.description: A silvery plant that seems to glow in moonlight. The forest guardian values these.
mysterious_herb.lore: This rare herb grows only in the deepest parts of the Dark Forest. It has alchemical and medicinal properties.

leather_armor.name: Leather Armor
leather_armor.description: Sturdy leather armor that offers decent protection without restricting movement.
leather_armor.lore: Crafted from treated hide, this armor is favored by scouts and rogues for its flexibility.

bandit_key.name: Iron Key
bandit_key.description: A crude iron key taken from the bandit leader. It likely opens something at the camp.
bandit_key.lore: Bandits aren't known for their craftsmanship, but this key might prove useful.
